title: Deep Generative Models
text:
The evidence lower bound (ELBO) for a VAE is:
\[
\mathcal{L}(\theta, \phi; \mathbf{x}) = \mathbb{E}_{q_\phi(\mathbf{z}|\mathbf{x})}[\log p_\theta(\mathbf{x}|\mathbf{z})] - D_{KL}(q_\phi(\mathbf{z}|\mathbf{x}) \parallel p(\mathbf{z}))
\]



Encoder: \(q_\phi(\mathbf{z}|\mathbf{x})\)

Decoder: \(p_\theta(\mathbf{x}|\mathbf{z})\)

Prior: \(p(\mathbf{z}) = \mathcal{N}(0, \mathbf{I})\)


The VAE maximizes the ELBO, which simultaneously: 1. Reconstructs inputs well (first term) 2. Keeps latent space organized (KL term)
